meanings.definition: The act of providing captions for a video or image.
meanings.sent1: I always appreciate the captioning on videos so I can understand them better.
meanings.sent2: The captioning on the movie helped me follow along with the dialogue.
meanings.sent3: The captioning on the silent film made me chuckle as the characters 'spoke'.
meanings.sent4: Her detailed captioning of the painting brought the artwork to life for me.
meanings.sent5: The captioning on the documentary was so clear, it felt like the narrator was right there.

meanings.definition: A brief explanation or description accompanying an illustration or photograph.
meanings.sent1: The captioning below the photo clarified what was happening in the image.
meanings.sent2: The captioning under the diagram helped me understand the scientific concept better.
meanings.sent3: The funny captioning under the cartoon made me laugh out loud.
meanings.sent4: Her poetic captioning of the landscape photo painted a vivid picture in my mind.
meanings.sent5: The captioning next to the artwork added depth to my appreciation of the piece.
